sample_articles.title: Novel approaches to endometriosis treatment: A systematic review
sample_articles.abstract: This systematic review examines novel therapeutic approaches for endometriosis treatment, including hormonal and surgical interventions. Results show promising outcomes for combined therapy approaches.

sample_articles.title: Long-term outcomes of IVF in patients with endometriosis
sample_articles.abstract: This retrospective study analyzes long-term IVF success rates in patients with varying degrees of endometriosis. Data from 1,250 patients over 5 years shows stage-dependent outcomes.
